pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed Computerized Adaptive Multistage Testing // Provides functions to more easily analyze computerized adaptive tests. Currently, functions for computerized adaptive tests (CAT), computer adaptive multistage tests (CMT), and mixed computer adaptive multistage tests (McaMST) utilizing CAT item-level adaptation for the initial stage and traditional MST module- level adaptation for the subsequent stages have been created, and a variation of Hybrid computer adaptive MST is planned as well. For an in-depth look at CAT and MST, see Weiss Kingsbury (1984) doi:10.1111/j.1745-3984.1984.tb01040.x and Luecht Nungester (2000) doi:10.1007/0-306-47531-6_6 respectively.
